children.name: a
children.sourceText: And who knoweth but the Lord will carry us forth into a land which is choice above all the earth?

children.name: above
children.sourceText: And who knoweth but the Lord will carry us forth into a land which is choice above all the earth?

children.name: all
children.sourceText: And who knoweth but the Lord will carry us forth into a land which is choice above all the earth?

children.name: and
children.sourceText: Cry again unto the Lord, and it may be that he will turn away his anger from them who are our friends, that he confound not their language.

children.name: but
children.sourceText: And who knoweth but the Lord will carry us forth into a land which is choice above all the earth?

children.name: for
children.sourceText: And if it so be, let us be faithful unto the Lord, that we may receive it for our inheritance.

children.name: from
children.sourceText: Cry again unto the Lord, and it may be that he will turn away his anger from them who are our friends, that he confound not their language.

children.name: he
children.sourceText: Cry unto the Lord, that he will not confound us that we may not understand our words.

children.name: him
children.sourceText: Go and inquire of the Lord whether he will drive us out of the land, and if he will drive us out of the land, cry unto him whither we shall go.

children.name: his
children.sourceText: Cry again unto the Lord, and it may be that he will turn away his anger from them who are our friends, that he confound not their language.

children.name: if
children.sourceText: Go and inquire of the Lord whether he will drive us out of the land, and if he will drive us out of the land, cry unto him whither we shall go.

children.sourceText: Go and inquire of the Lord whether he will drive us out of the land, and if he will drive us out of the land, cry unto him whither we shall go.

children.sourceText: Cry unto the Lord, that he will not confound us that we may not understand our words.

children.sourceText: Go and inquire of the Lord whether he will drive us out of the land, and if he will drive us out of the land, cry unto him whither we shall go.

children.name: shall
children.sourceText: Go and inquire of the Lord whether he will drive us out of the land, and if he will drive us out of the land, cry unto him whither we shall go.

children.name: so
children.sourceText: And if it so be, let us be faithful unto the Lord, that we may receive it for our inheritance.

children.name: that
children.sourceText: Cry unto the Lord, that he will not confound us that we may not understand our words.

children.name: the
children.sourceText: Cry unto the Lord, that he will not confound us that we may not understand our words.

children.name: their
children.sourceText: Cry again unto the Lord, and it may be that he will turn away his anger from them who are our friends, that he confound not their language.

children.name: them
children.sourceText: Cry again unto the Lord, and it may be that he will turn away his anger from them who are our friends, that he confound not their language.

children.name: they
children.sourceText: Suffer them that they may have a king.

children.name: unto
children.sourceText: Cry unto the Lord, that he will not confound us that we may not understand our words.

children.name: us
children.sourceText: Cry unto the Lord, that he will not confound us that we may not understand our words.

children.sourceText: Go and inquire of the Lord whether he will drive us out of the land, and if he will drive us out of the land, cry unto him whither we shall go.

children.sourceText: And who knoweth but the Lord will carry us forth into a land which is choice above all the earth?

children.sourceText: Cry again unto the Lord, and it may be that he will turn away his anger from them who are our friends, that he confound not their language.
